name: onchain-hojayega
description: Simplifying Web2 to Web3 transition by automating architecture planning, providing expert insights, and streamlining Solidity development with AI.

name: lumen
description: Built a Web3 MVP enabling product traceability, circular economies, and tokenized sustainability using Base for scalability. Raising grants and VC funding now for the next phase.

name: ezframes
description: No code Farcaster Frames Builder that abstracts the difficulities of creating Farcaster Frames and lets users create and manage them through a dashboard.

name: scaffold-essential
description: Scaffold Essential is a tool that simplifies starting projects with Next.js and Pint (DSL for Rust). It streamlines frontend development and smart contract compilation with intuitive commands, letting you focus on coding without the hassle of setup complexities.

name: asset
description: Asset personalizes DeFi trading using onchain and behavioral data, enabling chatbot-driven execution while tackling data integration and real-time strategy challenges.
